Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Why has my ad not been approved for so long?

If your ad hasn't been approved yet, it might be due to your account not being verified, especially if it's a new account. To proceed with the verification process, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
